videos.description: Bam Adebayo knocks down a tough shot along the baseline while drawing a foul with one second left in the first half.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam sinks tough and-1 jumper late in first half) 2021/01/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam sinks tough and-1 jumper late in first half
